Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill will miss the IND vs AFG match due to dengue and will not feature in the team's next fixture against Afghanistan in Delhi on October 11.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ishan Kishan was presented with the opportunity to open the innings along with captain Rohit Sharma against Australia, but the left-hander perished without contributing anything to the board.
Others: The match will be played on October 11, and India will next face Afghanistan in the round-robin format of World Cup 2023.
